casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
MORICE W. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 17, 2018 Matthew C. Eagan, assigned counsel, and Emily Graner Sexton, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Kathryn W. Bare, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 183 Conn. App. 32 , 191 A.3d 1040 (2018), is denied.

ROBINSON, C.J., and KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
